subject: BONANZA! TO YOU, HAPPY NEW MON
body:
BONANZA! TO YOU, HAPPY NEW MONTH OF CHRISTMAS
REPUBLIC OF BENIN. FOREIGN CONTRACTOR PAYMENT OFFICE
TELEPHONE MR. FRANK UTEH call at +229 99666416
SPECIAL CHRISTMAS BONANZA!!! BONANZA!!!  BONANZA!!!
Attention beneficiary
This is to notify all our clients about the latest development
concerning all the PAYMENT that is left in our custody. Which yours
are inclusive besides, your were given a High bill to pay for your
transfer paper permit of your fund, In order to receive your payment
of which we didn’t hear from you for some times now. Hence, AFRICAN
UNION (AU) Head Office has held meeting yesterday with (Western union
& Money Gram) the issue on the meeting is that they are now offering a
Special Bonus to help all our customers that are abandoned their funds
in our custody due to because of high price. In order words we are now
requesting that those involved should pay only the sum of $50 to
receive all their payment abandoned in our custody. You shall be
receiving $10,000 every day, $5000 from western union while after 3
hours you  shall pick up another $5000 from money gram making it total
sum of $10,000USD you shall pick every day, besides, my dear, this is
the great opportunity for you and you have to comply and your total
funds of $950,000.00 shall be transfer to your name and address before
end of February next year.
But 
note that after (7 working days} and you did not make the payment
of $50.00.then we will divert your funds to government treasurer to
avoid problem
 because we are about to enter into  a new project for
year 2023, Note; that after the (7 working days} We will enter new
project for the year 2023 and that is the reason we decided to help
all our customers before we enter the end of year project so be advise
to send $50 immediately if you are still willing & ready to claim your
payment so that we will register your payment once we receive the
transfer paper permit activation because you will start receiving your
payment as from tomorrow morning by 9:00 AM in your Country time.
$5000 from western union another second payment of $5000 from money
gram will be in afternoon by 3:30 PM making total of $10,000 you shall
pick at once,
After the payment of $50 we will give you the full information to pick
up your first/second payment of $10,000 through any western union &
money gram outlet in your country, Send the $50 via iTunes Gift Card
or through western union or money gram 
with below receiver's details:
Receiver’s: Lucy ODU
Phone: +229 98749550
Country: Republic of Benin
City: Porto Novo
Postal code: 229
Address: 13B/17 Close 11 Agata Benin republic
Amount: $50
Mtcn..............
Forward the payment details and sender name and address after sending
the Money to enable us pick up the money in this Department office
here.
Note: that we do this to help all our customers so don't delay because
any delay will make us to cancel your payment or divert payment to
Government to avoid problem because we don't have much time to delay
anymore.
I am looking forward to receive of $50 immediately to enable us to
give you the full information which you will use pick up your payment
in any western union or money gram office but fall to do so you will
lose your payment because you have only 7 working days after that no
more.
I wish you good luck and Merry Christmas in advance.
Yours in service
MRS. LINDA WUTEH call at +229 60922601
NEW HEAD OF DIRECTOR.
FOREIGN CONTRACTOR PAYMENT OFFICE
REPUBLIC OF BENIN
THIS IS OUR CONDUCT CODE (X306)

subject: Re: BONANZA! TO YOU, HAPPY NEW MON
body:
Dear Mrs. Linda Wuteh,

I received your email regarding the special Christmas bonanza and I am interested in proceeding with this. However, I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed.

Firstly, could you please provide more details about the payment process? You mentioned that I need to pay a certain amount for the transfer paper permit activation. Could you please explain what this is and why it is necessary?

Secondly, you mentioned that I will be receiving payments every day from Western Union and Money Gram. Could you please provide more details about this? How long will these daily payments continue?

Lastly, could you please confirm if there are any other fees or charges that I need to be aware of?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daphine
